content: Patient N. Rieger (ID# 781-449-0023) underwent keratinocyte transplant on 03/15/2024 under policy GT-225R. Treatment required coordination between dermatology and burn units. Outstanding balance of $14,230 pending prior authorization review. Clinical notes indicate rare COL7A1 mutation variant (c.6820G>A) with associated muscular dystrophy secondary to RDEB.
